search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Pipedrive (pipedrive.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.

extracted_content.content:

### LeadBooster add-on

Get more leads with this powerful and easy-to-use lead generation tool set. In addition to Chatbot and Live Chat you can engage inbound leads with your Web Forms, or find outbound leads with Prospector. LeadBooster can be added to any Pipedrive CRM plan. This add-on includes:

**[Chatbot](https://pipedrive.com/en/features/lead-generation-software/chat-bot)**

**[Live Chat](https://pipedrive.com/en/features/web-chat)**

**[Prospector](https://pipedrive.com/en/features/prospector)**

**[Web Forms](https://pipedrive.com/en/features/web-forms)**

**[Scheduler](https://pipedrive.com/en/products/sales/scheduling-tool)**

**Chatbot**

**Live Chat**

**Prospector**

**Web Forms**

**Scheduler**

per company per month, billed annually  
or $39 per company per month, billed monthly

### Web Visitors add-on

Identify which organizations are browsing your website. Web Visitors reveals how they found you, what they engaged with and how long they stayed. Use these insights to understand the wants and needs of your hottest leads and existing customers.

Starting from

per company per month, billed annually  
or $49 per company per month, billed monthly

Create and send customizable email campaigns with pro templates, built to get more clicks. Now you can see which emails win the hearts of your prospects and use real-time reporting to turn them into hot leads. Relax, knowing your sales and marketing teams are aligned with all customer interactions in one place.

### Smart Docs add-on

Centralize the entire documentation process by sending trackable quotes, proposals and contracts from within Pipedrive. Get notified when they are opened by a customer and request eSignatures from your clients to close deals faster. Use the tools your team loves, like Google Docs/Slides/Sheets or MS Docs, or upload PDFs. Set up company-wide template sharing, remove the Pipedrive logo.

Reach goals faster with Pipedrive’s online project management add-on. Map out complex projects in a simple and intuitive way. It's not just our CRM, it's part of our whole sales and account management process, so the ability to talk with the other tools we use is critical.

![Image 45: CW](https://www-cms.pipedriveassets.com/cdn-cgi/image/quality=90,format=auto,width=120/https://www-cms.pipedriveassets.com/testimonial-images/Chris-Wolpert.jpeg)**Chris Wolpert**Managing Member, Group Benefit Solutions

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

*   What is CRM pricing and how is it determined? What factors affect CRM software cost?
    
    CRM pricing refers to the cost of implementing and using [customer relationship management software](https://www.pipedrive.com/en/products/what-is-crm). The price is determined by factors like number of users, features included in the software, integrations and level of support provided by CRM companies.
    
*   How much does a CRM cost on average?
    
    CRM costs vary widely depending on the CRM company and features included. On average, the typical cost of CRM software ranges from less than a hundred to several hundred dollars per user per year, with some enterprise-level solutions costing even more. To find the best CRM software prices, research and compare CRM providers based on their pricing plans and features. Pipedrive offers different solutions at price points to match users’ requirements. Learn more on our [CRM price comparison](https://www.pipedrive.com/crm-comparison) pages.
    
*   Which CRM pricing models are available in Pipedrive? Which is the best one to choose?
    
    Pipedrive offers five main CRM plans: Essential, Advanced, Professional, Power and Enterprise. We recommend that you carefully evaluate your business needs and consider the features offered in each plan before deciding which CRM pricing model to choose.
    
    Take advantage of [Pipedrive’s 14-day free trial](https://www.pipedrive.com/register) to test the software before making a purchase decision.
    
*   Can my co-workers join my free trial?
    
    Yes, you can invite as many people as you want to join your Pipedrive trial. Simply click on your profile in the top right corner of your screen and select “Add more users” from the drop-down menu.
    
*   Can I try different plans during my trial?
    
    Yes, you can switch between our Essential, Advanced and Professional plans for free as much as you want during your trial.
    
*   Are there any plan limits during my free trial?
    
    All of our plans except Enterprise have feature usage limits that also apply during the trial period. Upgrade to a higher plan for free during your trial to increase your limits.
    
*   Will my data be safe?
    
    Protecting your business data is one of our highest priorities. Learn more about our rigorous [security and privacy](https://www.pipedrive.com/features/privacy-security) standards.
    
*   What is an add-on?
    
    Add-ons are additional Pipedrive tools that you can add to any plan. You are charged for add-ons per company, not per user.
    
*   What’s the difference between annual and monthly billing?
    
    The difference is [how often you pay](https://support.pipedrive.com/en/article/what-is-the-difference-between-annual-and-monthly-billing-in-pipedrive) your subscription fee. With monthly billing, you will be charged on the same day each month. With annual billing, you are charged once for the whole year.
    
*   Which payment methods do you accept?
    
    There are [different ways](https://support.pipedrive.com/en/article/what-are-the-accepted-payment-methods-for-pipedrive) to pay for Pipedrive including major credit cards, debit cards and PayPal. Your payment options depend on the country you live in.
    
*   How can I contact customer support?
    
    Our friendly support team is ready to help out. [Here’s how to get in touch.](https://support.pipedrive.com/en/contact-us)
    
*   What are the prices associated with CRM?
    
    As well as the cost of the customer relationship management software itself, which differs based on pricing tier, some providers also charge users for implementation, setup, training, data migration, support and more. You may also be able to purchase credits to get access to more features or more access to the features already on your plan. Try to find a CRM that’s transparent about its pricing. Pipedrive has no hidden costs, making it an excellent choice for anyone with a fixed budget.
    
    [](https://support.pipedrive.com/en/contact-us)
    
*   What does it cost to implement a CRM?
    
    The cost of implementing a CRM varies based on factors such as business size, software choice, user count, customization and integration needs. On-premises setups usually have higher upfront costs. Some CRM providers charge users for implementation. If you choose Pipedrive, implementation is free when you sign up for a pricing plan that’s over $400 a year. Costs differ widely, so a thorough evaluation is essential for an accurate estimate.

Pipedrive is a Web-based Sales CRM.

One payment of US$ 168 per seat/year

View and manage leads, deals, contacts, calendar events and more in one dashboard.

Easily import data from a spreadsheet or CRM. Integrate with 400+ apps, including Zapier, Zoom and Lemlist.

Track custom sales activities to uncover winning patterns, analyze revenue performance and opportunity outcomes, and generate AI-powered reports in seconds

Receive custom onboarding from a strategic partner to streamline your Pipedrive setup.

One payment of US$ 468 per seat/year

Fully sync Gmail, Outlook or your company email. Send bulk emails to contact groups and get notified when a recipient opens your email or clicks on a link you’ve sent.

Create automated workflows for routine tasks. Schedule automated email sequences, calls, meetings and more anytime a prospect moves to a new stage.

Schedule emails ahead of time and let customers pick a meeting time that works best for you both. Automatically set up video calls for meetings via Zoom, Microsoft Teams or Google Meet.

Start a live chat with a member of our award-winning support team Monday to Friday during business hours.

One payment of US$ 588 per seat/year

Receive suggestions on which deals are most likely to close and the next best actions to take. Create emails with custom prompts and summarize emails in seconds.

Send trackable quotes, proposals and contracts from within Pipedrive. Sign documents online.

Set up rules to auto-assign and distribute deals within teams for faster follow-ups. Create custom permissions and visibilities and manage user access at group and individual levels.

Use in-depth historical sales data to optimize your processes, predict future deals’ value and determine revenue. Use custom fields when filtering and building custom reports.

Improve data quality by setting up required and pipeline-specific fields and customizations for your team. Automate deal calculations and eliminate human error with formula fields.

One payment of US$ 768 per seat/year

Map out complex projects directly in Pipedrive with our Kanban board view. Create to-do lists with tasks and subtasks and easily track projects with labels, custom fields and filters.

Better facilitate and enable collaboration with five times as many custom permission sets, custom visibility groups and teams.

Start a live chat with a member of our award-winning support team 24/7, including holidays.

Request a call from a member of our award-winning support team.

One payment of US$ 1188 per seat/year

Secure your account with alerts for suspicious account activity. Add password security requirements, two-factor authentication and IP- and time-based access restrictions.

Create unlimited deals, custom fields, reports, teams, custom permissions sets, custom visibility groups and more.

Have up to 180 active automations and sync up to 5 emails per seat.

This website uses cookies and other tracking technologies to enhance user experience and to analyze performance and traffic on our website. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners. Further information is available in our:[Cookie Notice](https://www.pipedrive.com/en/cookie-notice)[Privacy Notice](https://www.pipedrive.com/en/privacy)

Preference center
-----------------

When you visit our website, we store cookies on your browser to collect information. The information collected might relate to you, your preferences or your device, and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to and to provide a more personalized web experience. However, you can choose not to allow certain types of cookies, which may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings according to your preference. You cannot opt-out of our First Party Strictly Necessary Cookies as they are deployed in order to ensure the proper functioning of our website (such as prompting the cookie banner and remembering your settings, to log into your account, to redirect you when you log out, etc.). For more information about the First and Third Party Cookies used please follow this link.  
[Cookie Notice](https://www.pipedrive.com/en/cookie-notice)[Privacy Notice](https://www.pipedrive.com/en/privacy)

Allow All

### Manage Consent Preferences

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Functional Cookies

Always Active

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.    If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Performance Cookies

Always Active

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.    All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Targeting Cookies

Always Active

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.    They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is per seat per month, billed annually or monthly. Add-ons are charged per company.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Get organized and set up simple sales processes quickly.
features: Lead, calendar and pipeline management
Seamless data import and 400+ integrations
Create activity, deal and contact reports with AI
Personalized onboarding

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Never miss the next step with easy-to-use email and automations.
features: Full email sync with templates, open and click tracking and group emailing
Automations builder, including email sequences
Meeting, email and video call scheduling
Live chat support

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Optimize performance with more customizations and reporting.
features: AI-powered Sales Assistant and emailing tools
Contract and proposal management with e-signatures
Streamlined lead routing and team management
Revenue forecasts and custom field reporting
Extra data entry and data quality settings

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Empower larger teams with flexible collaboration and support.
features: Project planning, tracking and delivery
Increased control of account permissions and visibilities
24/7 live chat support
Phone support

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Experience Pipedrive without limits and have ultimate peace of mind.
features: Enhanced security preferences
Unlimited reports and customizations
Maximize the number of automations and email syncs per seat

additional_fees.fee_description: Lead generation tool set including Chatbot, Live Chat, Prospector, Web Forms, and Scheduler.
Tool to identify organizations browsing your website.
Email campaign creation and analytics tool.
Document management tool for quotes, proposals, and contracts.
Project management tool for planning, tracking, and delivery.
